title: StartCrawlRequest
description: Request body for starting a new crawl job

driveId.description: ID of the drive to crawl

rootPath.description: Root path to start crawling from (defaults to drive root path if not specified)

isIncremental.description: Whether to perform incremental crawl (only check for changes) or full crawl

extractExif.description: Whether to extract EXIF metadata from images

generateThumbnails.description: Whether to generate thumbnails for images
